Package commandLineApp

Class MainMenu

java.lang.Object
commandLineApp.MainMenu
public class MainMenu
extends java.lang.Object
This class implements all the methods for the main game in the farm. simulator.
Version:
22 May 2020.
Author:
Hayley Krippner, Michelle Muchemwa

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors 
    Constructor Description
    MainMenu​(GameManager gameManager, MainMenuManager mainMenuManager)
    This method creates a MainMenu.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    void askMenuAction()
    This method asks the user what action they would like to do in the MainMenu, provided the game has not ended.
    void calculateDailyFarmBonus()
    This method calculates the DailyFarmBonus at the end of the day based on the happiness and health level of the Animals and the number of Animals.
    int calculateFinalScore()
    This method calculates the user's final game score based on the number of Crops and Animals, the overall farm profit and game duration.
    void displayDailySummary()
    This method displys the current day of the total game duration, the DailyFarmBonus and the Farm's money.
    void displayEndGameStats()
    This method displays the ended game's statistics of the final game score, game duration and total Farm profit.
    void displayMenuActions()
    This method displays the MainMenu actions the user can choose from.
    void endGame()  
    void executeMenuAction()
    This method executes the chosen user MainMenu action.
    int findLandOfAnimal​(FarmObject animal)
    This method finds the LandPlot that the Animal is in.
    double getDailyFarmBonus()  
    float getDailyProfit()  
    GameManager getGameManager()  
    int getMainMenuAction()  
    void nextDay()  
    void sayInMainMenu()
    This method inform the user that they are in the GeneralStore.
    void startMainMenuLoop()
    This method starts the MainMenu.
    void viewFarmDetails()
    This method displays the Farm name, type, money, daily farm bonus, game duration and current day.

    Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

    equals, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

  • Constructor Details

    • MainMenu

      public MainMenu​(GameManager gameManager, MainMenuManager mainMenuManager)
      This method creates a MainMenu. It manages what the user can do in the farm simulator game.
      Parameters:
      gameManager - The central game controller.
      mainMenuManager - This manages the MainMenu.

  • Method Details

    • startMainMenuLoop

      public void startMainMenuLoop()
      This method starts the MainMenu.

    • sayInMainMenu

      public void sayInMainMenu()
      This method inform the user that they are in the GeneralStore.

    • getDailyFarmBonus

      public double getDailyFarmBonus()

    • getMainMenuAction

      public int getMainMenuAction()

    • getDailyProfit

      public float getDailyProfit()

    • getGameManager

      public GameManager getGameManager()

    • askMenuAction

      public void askMenuAction()
      This method asks the user what action they would like to do in the MainMenu, provided the game has not ended. It gets valid input. The MainMenu action is requested to be executed.

    • displayMenuActions

      public void displayMenuActions()
      This method displays the MainMenu actions the user can choose from.

    • executeMenuAction

      public void executeMenuAction()
      This method executes the chosen user MainMenu action.

    • viewFarmDetails

      public void viewFarmDetails()
      This method displays the Farm name, type, money, daily farm bonus, game duration and current day.

    • nextDay

      public void nextDay()

    • calculateDailyFarmBonus

      public void calculateDailyFarmBonus()
      This method calculates the DailyFarmBonus at the end of the day based on the happiness and health level of the Animals and the number of Animals.

    • findLandOfAnimal

      public int findLandOfAnimal​(FarmObject animal)
      This method finds the LandPlot that the Animal is in.
      Parameters:
      animal - Animal whose LandPlot index is required.
      Returns:
      desiredLandIndex The LandPlot's index.

    • displayDailySummary

      public void displayDailySummary()
      This method displys the current day of the total game duration, the DailyFarmBonus and the Farm's money.

    • endGame

      public void endGame()

    • calculateFinalScore

      public int calculateFinalScore()
      This method calculates the user's final game score based on the number of Crops and Animals, the overall farm profit and game duration.
      Returns:
      finalScore The user's final game score.

    • displayEndGameStats

      public void displayEndGameStats()
      This method displays the ended game's statistics of the final game score, game duration and total Farm profit. It displays the creators of the game.
